channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Deep Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Deep Security

item.title: CVE-2020-15601|2024-08-04T13:22:30.378Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20deep%20security
item.description: If LDAP authentication is enabled, an LDAP authentication bypass vulnerability in Trend Micro Deep Security 10.x-12.x could allow an unauthenticated attacker with prior knowledge of the targeted organization to bypass manager authentication. Enabling multi-factor authentication prevents this attack. Installations using manager native authentication or SAML authentication are not impacted by this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-8602|2024-08-04T10:03:46.269Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20deep%20security
item.description: A vulnerability in the management consoles of Trend Micro Deep Security 10.0-12.0 and Trend Micro Vulnerability Protection 2.0 SP2 may allow an authenticated attacker with full control privileges to bypass file integrity checks, leading to remote code execution.
